About Me

My name is Frederik Rudeck and I‘m a master student at the Hasso-Plattner-Institute where I study IT-Systems Engineering. In 2007 I finished my Bachelor of Science in IT-Systems Engineering at the Hasso Plattner Institute. During my study I did an internship at SAP Canada in Montreal.

I‘m currently writing my master thesis and looking for work as an full time employee or intern. If you think that I can help you feel free to contact me and I can provide you with more detailed information about myself. Visit my linkedin profile to see my public résumé.

I‘m mainly working with C, C++ and C# right now but have experience with Python, Ruby, Flex and Javascript as well. Have a look at my recent projects or at my github page to see what I am doing.
